title: Mans Olson: Minecraft官方启动器最新进展
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-5-14 08:50 编辑 



Mans Olson: One more screenshot of the new Minecraft launcher. It should answer some of the most common questions about it. :>
Mans Olson: 再来一张Minecraft官方启动器的截图.它应该可以回答一些疑问. :>
Mans Olson: Remember, this is still work in progress. A few margins and such definitely still need tweaking.
Mans Olson: 别忘了, 这项工程还在进行中. 一些边框和设置还需要调整.

replies.author: ianyukun1213
replies.txt_content: 真得方便许多，功能也多了。

replies.author: 毒蛇
replies.txt_content: 挺方便的啊

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content: 我就说他们为什么要加入上传皮肤的mojang api，原来是为了这个。。。（http://wiki.vg/Mojang_API#Change_Skin）

replies.author: TimmyOVO
replies.txt_content: 不错的启动器，看起来比以前好多了

replies.author: tsd1
replies.txt_content: 似乎方便了一些，不过界面还是不咋好看……

replies.author: 无形-Warning
replies.txt_content: 期待Mojang快点发布

replies.author: 无形-Warning
replies.txt_content: 貌似不支持多国语言

replies.author: 疾风清酒
replies.txt_content: 好方便，希望MoJang快更新

replies.author: lsz7575
replies.txt_content: 就是变成了网页类型了么...

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content: 这启动器太好看，，，而且看起来可以调语言

replies.author: 宇来自RR网
replies.txt_content: 比现在的方面很多了

replies.author: 折君
replies.txt_content: 太棒了，看来以后不用每次换皮肤都去minecraft.net了

replies.author: 回调然后他
replies.txt_content: 哇哦，方便多了啦，可是多会儿有那？
